thread.title: Accidents cause congestion on Dubai-Sharjah roads
thread.title_full: Accidents cause congestion on Dubai-Sharjah roads

title: Accidents cause congestion on Dubai-Sharjah roads
text: Motorists are advised to drive cautiously. Morning rush on Tuesday morning slowed down traffic on main Dubai and Sharjah roads. According to Google Maps, slow traffic movement was observed on certain sections of Dubai's Sheikh Zayed Road, including around Safa Park and Business Bay. The usual traffic jam was reported on Sharjah's Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Road towards Dubai. Motorists are advised to follow road safety rules and take alternate routes where possible. Dear Driver: Don't drive recklessly and remember that there is always someone waiting for you to return safely #YourSecurityOurHappiness pic.twitter.com/lXfpEDJnM2 - Dubai Police???? ??? (@DubaiPoliceHQ) February 28, 2017 Multiple accidents on today morning slowed down traffic on parts of Dubai's roads especially on Al Khail road and E66 from Sharjah towards Dubai. Its a bad day for motorists using D61 Hessa St today. Second accident reported just before Al Khail Rd exit towards #SMBZR . pic.twitter.com/Xvu9KiqwCP
